original_text: Though the army of the Syrians had come with few men, the Lord delivered into their hand a very great army, because Judah had forsaken the Lord, the God of their fathers. Thus they executed judgment on Joash.
korean_text: 아람 군대가 적은 무리로 왔으나 여호와께서 심히 큰 군대를 그들의 손에 넘기셨으니 이는 유다 사람들이 그들의 조상들의 하나님 여호와를 버렸음이라 이와 같이 아람 사람들이 요아스를 징벌하였더라

sentences.original_text: Though the army of the Syrians had come with few men
the Lord delivered into their hand a very great army
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 그들의 손에 매우 큰 군대를 넘겨주셨으니

sentences.original_text: because Judah had forsaken the Lord
Thus they executed judgment on Joash
